summary: Lead ML consultant delivering production systems and experimentation frameworks across fintech, retail, and subscription platforms.
bullets: Mentored 6 data scientists across concurrent client engagements.
Established reusable MLOps scaffold (feature store + experiment tracking) adopted by 4 client teams.

projects.name: Client A – Churn Prediction & Retention Pipeline
bullets: Designed weekly churn risk scoring (AUC 0.89) driving targeted retention campaigns.
Implemented automated feature freshness checks reducing stale feature issues by 70%.
Integrated uplift modeling to prioritize interventions, improving campaign ROI by 18%.
projects.impact: Reduced voluntary churn in a pilot cohort by 14% within 3 months.

projects.name: Client B – Experimentation Governance Platform
bullets: Built pre-launch power & MDE estimator with CUPED variance reduction module.
Added guardrail metrics (latency, error rate) auto-attached to all experiments.
Reduced invalid or inconclusive experiment rate from 18% to 5%.
projects.impact: Accelerated decision velocity for product managers (median test duration -22%).

projects.name: Client C – Real-Time Personalization
bullets: Prototyped embedding-based recommendation reranker (mean CTR lift +6.3%).
Deployed streaming feature ingestion via Kinesis + Lambda (P99 < 1.3s).

summary: Delivered foundational analytics & predictive models for early-stage clients.

projects.name: Client D – Lead Scoring Model
bullets: Delivered SHAP-based explainability reports adopted by sales ops.

projects.name: Client E – Pricing Elasticity Analysis
bullets: Applied panel regression + causal uplift to simulate scenario pricing.
Produced pricing playbook used in quarterly strategy reviews.
